page.title: 12Village Societies(Bentley)
page.content: {Womens' Institute} This has meetings once a month for women in the village.There is a speaker every month to talk on various subjects and they go on outings.Every year there is a Craft Show and each April a birthday party for members and friends. {Over 60's} A social afternoon once a fortnight at the village hall when members play whist or bingo and chat over a cup of tea and a biscuit.They have an outing in the Summer and go out for a meal at Christmas time. {Football Club} They have 2 teams A and B and are in a local league {Footpath Society} They go for walks,usually on Sundays,and try to keep the local footpaths open.
